import { displayedBookFields } from "../contentSections/OutputSection" import './BookDisplay.css' interface props { bookFields: displayedBookFields, index: number } const BookDisplay: React.FC = ({ bookFields, index }) => { return (

0{index}

{bookFields.title}

Written by {bookFields.author}

{bookFields.rating.toFixed(2)} stars



{bookFields.description}
) } export default BookDisplay
